div.head: About the VSim Repository and Archive
div.p: VSim facilitates the real-time exploration and educational use of highly detailed, three-dimensional computer models. The National Endowment for the Humanities (HD-50958-10 and HK-50164-14) and UCLAâ€™s Institute for Digital Research and Education funded the development of VSim and the VSim Repository and Archive.

p.hi: Project Team (all affiliated with UCLA unless otherwise noted):

div.p: Principle Investigators: Lisa M. Snyder and Scott Friedman

Advisory Board: Diane Favro, Alyson Gill (University of Massachusetts Amherst), Steve Mintz (University of Texas at Austin), David Staley (Ohio State University), Elaine A. Sullivan (University of California, Santa Cruz)
Prototype Programmers: Eduardo Poyart, Jingyi (Franklin) Fang, and XinLi Cai
Usability Consultants: Elaine A. Sullivan and Joy Guey
Production Version Programmers: Cristina (Sam) Amin and David Stephan ... add others
Repository and Archive: Peter Broadwell (Project Manager), Hardy Pottinger (Lead Programmer), Lisa MacAulay ... add others
